resources.string: ‚úÖ Ready to Install APKs\n\nOpen any APK file and select anyapk

‚ö†Ô∏è Setup Required

Step 1: Enable Developer Options
 ‚Ä¢ Open Settings ‚Üí About Phone
 ‚Ä¢ Tap "Build Number" 7 times
 ‚Ä¢ You'll see "You are now a developer!"

Step 2: Enable Wireless Debugging
 ‚Ä¢ Go to Settings ‚Üí Developer Options
 ‚Ä¢ Enable "Wireless debugging"

Step 3: Pair with anyapk
 ‚Ä¢ Tap "Enter Pairing Code" below

‚ö†Ô∏è Pairing Required

Steps:
1. Open Settings ‚Üí Developer Options
2. Ensure "Wireless debugging" is ON
3. Tap "Pair device with pairing code"
4. Tap "Enter Pairing Code" below
5. Use split-screen to keep both apps visible
6. Enter the code and port

‚ö†Ô∏è Pairing Required

1. Enable "Wireless debugging" in Developer Options
2. Tap "Enter Pairing Code" below
3. Follow pairing instructions

üì± IMPORTANT: Use Split Screen!

1. Tap the Recent Apps button (square)
2. Long-press on Settings, select "Open in split screen view"
3. Select anyapk for the other half
4. In Settings: Developer Options ‚Üí Wireless Debugging
5. Tap "Pair device with pairing code"
6. Enter the code and port below

With split screen, the pairing dialog stays visible!
After pairing, you should see an \"Allow USB debugging?\" prompt. Tap \"Always allow from this computer\" then \"Allow\".
